title: Drawing, "Mythological or Biblical Scene; Juno and Jove Enthroned with Three Fates; Three Graces with Apollo and Minerva; Sculptural Relief and Obelisk"
medium: Pen and brown ink on wove paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mythological or Biblical Scene; Juno and Jove Enthroned with Three Fates; Three Graces with Apollo and Minerva; Sculptural Relief and Obelisk".
Pen and brown ink on wove paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2039.
